dashboard_description: Complete overview of your retirement journey – past achievements and future possibilities
dashboard_card_portfolio_value_descripti: Quick overview of your current position
dashboard_portfolio_add_statements: Add statements to see growth trends
household_description: Manage your household members and their retirement planning.
household_delete_confirm_before: Are you sure you want to delete
settings_description: Customize your experience with personalized preferences and calculation parameters
settings_language_description: Choose your preferred language and formats
settings_number_format_description: Configure how numbers, dates, and currency values are displayed
settings_growth_rates_description: Configure annual growth rates for different pension types
settings_rate_pessimistic_exceeds_realis: {label} pessimistic rate cannot exceed realistic rate
settings_rate_realistic_below_pessimisti: {label} realistic rate cannot be below pessimistic rate
settings_rate_realistic_exceeds_optimist: {label} realistic rate cannot exceed optimistic rate
settings_rate_optimistic_below_realistic: {label} optimistic rate cannot be below realistic rate
projection_understanding_text: These rates are used to calculate potential future values of your investments across different market scenarios, adjusted for inflation.
projection_example_text: A hypothetical portfolio of {currentValue} with a monthly contribution of {monthlyContribution}, a time horizon of {years} years and an inflation rate of {inflationRate}%.
compass_description: Navigate your retirement journey with smart analysis and personalized guidance
compass_coming_soon: Coming soon: Advanced features including inflation adjustment, tax considerations, and historical tracking of your pension health progress.
payout_description: Plan and optimize your retirement income distribution with smart, adaptive strategies
payout_coming_soon: Coming soon: Enhanced features including social security integration, legacy planning tools, and geographic cost-of-living analysis.
health_connection: Connection to the FastAPI backend on port 8000.
health_make_sure: Make sure the backend is running:
health_if_else_description: Template logic remains the same as in Svelte 4
health_fetch_description: Standard browser fetch, no special framework needed
pension_description: Manage your pension plans and track your retirement savings.
pension_no_pensions: No pension plans yet. Add your first pension plan to start tracking your retirement savings.
pension_delete_confirm_before: Are you sure you want to delete
pension_select_type_description: Choose the type of pension plan you want to create.
pension_select_member_description: Choose which household member this pension plan is for.
pension_type_insurance_description: Insurance company managed pension with guaranteed returns
pension_type_state_description: Government/state pension based on employment history
pension_no_members: Please add a household member first before creating a pension plan.
pension_pause_description: This will pause all future contributions to your pension plan from the selected date. You can resume contributions at any time.
pension_resume_description: Select the date from which you want to resume contributions to your pension plan.
delete_confirm_before: Are you sure you want to delete
contribution_add_first: No contributions planned yet. Click to add your first contribution.
contribution_history_explanation: This section shows all contributions that have been recorded for this pension plan. Years can be expanded or collapsed. The total amount per year is shown in the header.
contribution_plan_explanation_intro: Define your regular contribution schedule. You can set up multiple steps to reflect changes in contribution amounts over time.
contribution_plan_explanation_amount: The regular contribution amount for this step
contribution_plan_explanation_frequency: How often contributions are made (monthly, quarterly, yearly, or one-time)
contribution_plan_explanation_dates: Start and optional end date for this contribution step
contribution_plan_explanation_alert_insu: You can plan future changes in your contribution amount or frequency by adding additional steps.
contribution_plan_explanation_alert_comp: Adding detailed contribution steps helps you track your pension growth more accurately.
state_pension_new_description: Add your state pension details and track your benefits over time.
state_pension_edit_description: Update your state pension details and track your benefits over time.
state_pension_basic_info_description: Enter the basic details of your state pension
state_pension_basic_info_edit_descriptio: Keep your state pension details up to date
state_pension_notes_placeholder: Add any notes about this pension plan
state_pension_statements_description: Record information from your state pension statements
state_pension_statement_note_placeholder: Add any notes about this statement
state_pension_add_first_statement: No statements added yet. Click to add your first statement.
state_pension_delete_statement_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this statement? This action cannot be undone.
state_pension_scenarios_description: View projections of future benefits based on retirement age and growth rates
state_pension_planned_retirement_descrip: Projected benefits if you retire at your planned retirement age in {years} years.
state_pension_alternative_retirement_des: Projected benefits if you delay retirement to age {age} (in {years} years).
state_pension_no_scenarios: There are currently no statements with which scenarios could be calculated. Please add at least one pension statement to see projections.
state_pension_scenarios_error: Unable to load pension projections. Please try again later.
state_pension_understanding_growth_text: The growth rates shown represent the annual adjustment to your state pension benefits based on various economic factors. These include inflation adjustments, wage growth, and policy-based increases to the state pension.
state_pension_delayed_benefit_1: Higher monthly and annual pension payments
state_pension_delayed_benefit_2: Additional years of contributions increasing your benefit base
state_pension_delayed_benefit_3: Potential bonus credits for delaying retirement past standard age
state_pension_consideration_1: Your state pension will be adjusted annually based on the Triple Lock or similar policy
state_pension_consideration_2: Projections assume you continue to qualify for full benefits until retirement
state_pension_consideration_3: Review your state pension statements regularly for the most current information
state_pension_explanation_intro: Enter the basic information about your state pension plan. This information helps you track your pension entitlements.
state_pension_explanation_name: A descriptive name for your state pension (e.g., "UK State Pension")
state_pension_explanation_start_date: When you started contributing to the state pension system
state_pension_explanation_notes: Any additional information about your state pension entitlement
state_pension_explanation_alert: Your state pension is provided by the government based on your contribution history. Unlike private pensions, you don't typically make direct contributions to a state pension.
state_pension_statements_explanation_int: Add statements from your state pension authority to track your entitlement over time and see how your projected benefits change.
state_pension_statements_explanation_dat: When the statement was issued by the pension authority
state_pension_statements_explanation_cur: The monthly benefit you would receive if you claimed now
state_pension_statements_explanation_pro: The estimated monthly benefit at retirement age
state_pension_statements_explanation_val: The estimated capital value of your state pension (optional)
state_pension_statements_explanation_ale: Recording your state pension statements regularly helps you track changes in your projected benefits and plan more effectively for retirement.
state_pension_scenarios_explanation_intr: The scenarios section shows how your state pension benefits might vary based on different retirement ages and economic growth assumptions.
state_pension_scenarios_explanation_text: State pensions typically increase over time based on various factors like inflation, wage growth, and government policy changes. The projections shown here use different growth rate assumptions to help you understand the range of possible outcomes.
state_pension_scenarios_explanation_plan: Projections based on your set retirement age
state_pension_scenarios_explanation_alte: Shows how delaying retirement could increase benefits
state_pension_scenarios_explanation_real: Expected growth rate based on historical trends
state_pension_scenarios_explanation_aler: These projections are estimates only and actual benefits may differ based on future economic conditions and changes to government pension policies.
savings_pension_new_description: Create a savings-based pension plan to track your retirement savings account.
savings_pension_edit_description: Update your savings account details and track your retirement savings over time.
savings_pension_basic_info_description: Enter the basic details of your savings account
savings_pension_basic_info_edit_descript: Update the basic details of your savings account
savings_pension_notes_placeholder: Add any notes about this savings pension
savings_pension_explanation_intro: Enter the basic information about your savings pension plan. This helps you track your savings and monitor growth over time.
savings_pension_explanation_name: A descriptive name for your savings pension
savings_pension_explanation_start_date: When you started or will start saving
savings_pension_explanation_compounding: How often interest is calculated and added to your balance
savings_pension_explanation_notes: Any additional notes or context about this pension
savings_pension_explanation_alert: Setting realistic interest rates helps create more accurate projections for your retirement planning.
savings_pension_interest_rates_descripti: Configure interest rates for different scenarios
savings_pension_interest_rates_explanati: Define different interest rate scenarios to model potential returns on your savings. This helps you understand the range of possible outcomes.
Conservative estimate for lower market performance
Expected average return based on market conditions
Consider historical market returns and inflation when setting your interest rates. The realistic rate is typically between the pessimistic and optimistic rates.
savings_pension_statements_description: Record your savings account balance over time
savings_pension_statement_note_placehold: Add any notes about this statement
savings_pension_add_first_statement: No statements added yet. Click to add your first statement.
savings_pension_delete_statement_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this statement? This action cannot be undone.
savings_pension_statements_explanation_i: Record your savings statements to track the growth of your pension over time. Regular updates help you monitor progress towards your retirement goals.
savings_pension_statements_explanation_a: Regular statement updates help track your actual returns against projections and adjust your savings strategy if needed.
savings_pension_contribution_plan_descri: Set up your regular deposits to this savings account
savings_pension_contribution_plan_explan: Plan your savings contributions over time. You can set up multiple contribution steps to reflect changes in your saving capacity.
How much you plan to save
Start and optional end date for this contribution step
Consider setting up increasing contributions over time to match expected salary growth and maximize your retirement savings.
insurance_pension_new_description: Add your insurance-based pension details and track your policy over time.
insurance_pension_edit_description: Update your insurance pension details and manage your statements.
insurance_pension_basic_info_description: Enter the basic details of your insurance pension policy
insurance_pension_basic_info_edit_descri: Update the basic details of your insurance pension policy
insurance_pension_notes_placeholder: Add any notes about this pension policy
insurance_pension_explanation_intro: Enter the basic information about your insurance pension policy. This helps you track your policy details and project future benefits.
insurance_pension_explanation_name: A descriptive name for your insurance pension (e.g., "Allianz Life Policy")
insurance_pension_explanation_provider: The insurance company or provider managing your pension
insurance_pension_explanation_contract_n: Your policy contract number for reference
insurance_pension_explanation_guaranteed: The minimum guaranteed interest rate stated in your policy contract
insurance_pension_explanation_expected: The expected return rate used for benefit projections
insurance_pension_explanation_notes: Any additional information about your insurance pension policy
insurance_pension_explanation_alert: Insurance pension projections are estimates. Your actual benefits depend on the performance of the insurance fund and the specific terms of your policy.
insurance_pension_statements_description: Record your annual insurance pension statements
insurance_pension_statement_note_placeho: Add any notes about this statement
insurance_pension_add_first_statement: No statements added yet. Click to add your first statement.
insurance_pension_delete_statement_confi: Are you sure you want to delete this statement and all its projections? This action cannot be undone.
insurance_pension_no_projections: No projections yet. Click to add one.
insurance_pension_statements_explanation: Add annual statements from your insurance provider to track your policy value and projected benefits over time.
The current surrender or transfer value of your policy
The total amount you have paid in premiums to date
The total guaranteed benefits or death benefit stated on the statement
Annual charges deducted from your policy
Each statement can include multiple benefit projections showing estimated values at retirement under different return rate assumptions and contribution scenarios
Keep your statements up to date to track how costs and projections change over time. Projections from your provider are often more accurate than generic calculations.
company_pension_new_description: Add your employer-sponsored pension details and track your benefits over time.
company_pension_edit_description: Update your company pension details and manage your statements.
company_pension_basic_info_description: Enter the basic details of your company pension
company_pension_basic_info_edit_descript: Update the basic details of your company pension
company_pension_notes_placeholder: Add any notes about this pension
company_pension_explanation_intro: Enter the basic information about your company pension. This helps you track employer-sponsored retirement benefits.
company_pension_explanation_name: A descriptive name for your company pension
company_pension_explanation_employer: The name of the employer sponsoring this pension
company_pension_explanation_start_date: When you started participating in the company pension scheme
company_pension_explanation_contribution: The amount regularly contributed to your pension (by you and/or your employer)
company_pension_explanation_notes: Any additional information about this company pension arrangement
company_pension_explanation_alert: Company pensions vary widely in structure. Some are defined benefit (guaranteed payout) while others are defined contribution (investment-based). Check your plan documents for the exact terms.
company_pension_statements_description: Record your annual company pension statements
company_pension_statement_note_placehold: Add any notes about this statement
company_pension_add_first_statement: No statements added yet. Click to add your first statement.
company_pension_delete_statement_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this statement and all its projections? This action cannot be undone.
company_pension_no_projections: No projections yet. Click to add one.
company_pension_statements_explanation_i: Add annual statements from your company pension provider to track your benefit entitlements over time.
company_pension_statements_explanation_v: The current transfer value or fund value of your pension
company_pension_statements_explanation_p: Each statement can include multiple retirement projections showing estimated payouts at different retirement ages
company_pension_statements_explanation_a: Recording statements regularly helps you monitor how your benefit entitlements are growing and whether your retirement targets are on track.
etf_pension_new_description: Add your ETF-based pension details, contribution plan, and track performance over time.
etf_pension_edit_description: Edit your ETF pension details, manage your contribution plan, and view performance projections.
etf_pension_initialized_toast: Pension initialized from existing data. Calculations are being processed.
etf_init_method_title: How would you like to set up your ETF pension?
etf_init_new_desc: Start fresh with regular contributions to a new ETF position
etf_init_existing_desc: You already own ETF units and want to track them going forward
etf_init_historical_desc: Import your past contribution history to calculate your current position
etf_search_min_chars: Enter at least 3 characters to search
etf_projection_no_steps: Add contribution steps to see value projections
etf_basic_info_explanation_intro: Enter the basic information about your ETF pension. The ETF you select determines how your portfolio performance is tracked.
etf_basic_info_explanation_name: A descriptive name for your ETF pension plan (e.g., "World ETF Portfolio")
etf_basic_info_explanation_etf: The ETF tracked in this pension. Search by name, ISIN, or symbol. This cannot be changed after creation.
etf_basic_info_explanation_notes: Any additional notes or reminders about this ETF pension
etf_contribution_explanation_intro: Define your regular contribution schedule. You can add multiple steps to reflect changes in contribution amounts over time.
etf_contribution_explanation_growth: Regular contributions combined with long-term ETF growth are the foundation of a successful investment strategy. Even small monthly amounts can grow significantly over time.
etf_historical_explanation_intro: This chart shows your actual ETF portfolio performance compared to your total contributions over time.
etf_historical_explanation_value: The blue line shows the actual market value of your ETF holdings based on historical prices
etf_historical_explanation_contributions: The orange line shows your cumulative contributions — the total amount you have invested
etf_projection_explanation_intro: These projections show potential future values of your ETF portfolio based on different growth rate assumptions.
etf_projection_explanation_scenarios: Three scenarios are shown: pessimistic, realistic, and optimistic — based on the return rates configured in your settings
etf_projection_explanation_alert: These projections are estimates based on consistent return rates. Actual returns will vary year to year and may differ significantly.
pension_scenario_rates_description: Per-pension expected return rates (override global defaults)
pension_scenario_rates_explanation: Set custom expected return rates for this pension. Pre-filled with your global defaults — adjust based on specific expectations.
compass_gap_description: Calculate how much capital you need at retirement and whether your current plans are sufficient.
compass_gap_desired_pension_hint: Leave empty to calculate from net income × replacement rate
compass_gap_setup_description: Enter your income details to calculate your personal retirement gap.
compass_gap_no_config_cta: Enter your income details above to see your retirement gap.
compass_gap_retirement_already_reached: Retirement date already reached — inflation adjustment skipped
